Header: President pledges to increase capacity of Kinniya Hospital during Trinco visit
Content: A protest at the Kinniya Base Hospital which was being staged over the past four days, calling on officials to increase the capacity of the hospital,  came to an end today through the intervention of President Maithripala Sirisena. The president engaged in a sudden inspection of the Kinniya Base Hospital while en route to the Yovunpura camp in Trincomalee. The President met with the protesters, during his visit, and pledged to resolve the issues plaguing the hospital. The Kinniya Base Hospital was one of the key points of relief for a multitude of persons who were affected by the Dengue and Influenza viruses that were plaguing the area.
